End-User License Agreement for SigmaGraph

Important: please read the terms and conditions of this license agreement carefully before continuing with this program install:
Sidi OULD SAAD HAMADY's End-User License Agreement ("EULA") is a legal agreement between you (either an individual or a single entity) and Sidi OULD SAAD HAMADY for the software identified above which may include associated software components, media, printed materials, and "online" or electronic documentation.
By installing, copying, or otherwise using SigmaGraph, you agree to be bound by the terms of this EULA. This license agreement represents the entire agreement concerning the program between you and Sidi OULD SAAD HAMADY, (referred to as "licenser"), and it supersedes any prior proposal, representation, or understanding between the parties.
If you do not agree to the terms of this EULA, do not install or use SigmaGraph.

SigmaGraph is protected by copyright laws and international copyright treaties, as well as other intellectual property laws and treaties. SigmaGraph is licensed, not sold.

1. GRANT OF LICENSE.
SigmaGraph is licensed as follows:
(a) Installation and Use.
Sidi OULD SAAD HAMADY grants you the right to install and use copies of SigmaGraph on your computer running a validly licensed copy of the operating system for which SigmaGraph was designed.
(b) Backup Copies.
You may also make copies of SigmaGraph as may be necessary for backup and archival purposes.

2. DESCRIPTION OF OTHER RIGHTS AND LIMITATIONS.
(a) Maintenance of Copyright Notices.
You must not remove or alter any copyright notices on any and all copies of SigmaGraph.
(b) Rental.
You may not rent, lease, or lend SigmaGraph.
(c) Compliance with Applicable Laws.
You must comply with all applicable laws regarding use of SigmaGraph.

3. TERMINATION
Without prejudice to any other rights, Sidi OULD SAAD HAMADY may terminate this EULA if you fail to comply with the terms and conditions of this EULA. In such event, you must destroy all copies of SigmaGraph in your possession.

4. COPYRIGHT
All title, including but not limited to copyrights, in and to SigmaGraph and any copies thereof are owned by Sidi OULD SAAD HAMADY or its suppliers. All title and intellectual property rights in and to the content which may be accessed through use of SigmaGraph is the property of the respective content owner and may be protected by applicable copyright or other intellectual property laws and treaties. This EULA grants you no rights to use such content. All rights not expressly granted are reserved by Sidi OULD SAAD HAMADY

5. NO WARRANTIES
Sidi OULD SAAD HAMADY expressly disclaims any warranty for SigmaGraph. SigmaGraph is provided 'As Is' without any express or implied warranty of any kind, including but not limited to any warranties of merchantability, noninfringement, or fitness of a particular purpose. Sidi OULD SAAD HAMADY does not warrant or assume responsibility for the accuracy or completeness of any information, text, graphics, links or other items contained within SigmaGraph. Sidi OULD SAAD HAMADY makes no warranties respecting any harm that may be caused by the transmission of a computer virus, worm, time bomb, logic bomb, or other such computer program. Sidi OULD SAAD HAMADY further expressly disclaims any warranty or representation to Authorized Users or to any third party.

6. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
In no event shall Sidi OULD SAAD HAMADY be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, lost profits, business interruption, or lost information) rising out of 'Authorized Users' use of or inability to use SigmaGraph, even if Sidi OULD SAAD HAMADY has been advised of the possibility of such damages. In no event will Sidi OULD SAAD HAMADY be liable for loss of data or for indirect, special, incidental, consequential (including lost profit), or other damages based in contract, tort or otherwise. Sidi OULD SAAD HAMADY shall have no liability with respect to the content of SigmaGraph or any part thereof, including but not limited to errors or omissions contained therein, libel, infringements of rights of publicity, privacy, trademark rights, business interruption, personal injury, loss of privacy, moral rights or the disclosure of confidential information.
